Price: $47.99 - $39.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 11:39:52 UTC – Details)


TOSY 36 and 360 LEDs Frisbee – Extremely Bright Flying Disc, Smart Modes, Glow in The Dark, Auto Light Up, Rechargeable, 175g, Perfect Christmas, Birthday & Camping Gift for Men/Boys/Teenagers
36 SUPER BRIGHT LEDs – 100x brighter than any other light-up discs! Our black plastic disc looks super cool, while the white plastic disc gives you more visibility at night when you throw it outdoor.
SMART MODES & MOTION SENSORS – Easily select the Brightness level and Timer mode you want. LEDs light turns on and off automatically for battery-saving.
RECHARGEABLE – 30-minute charge that lasts up to a thousand throws or a full Ultimate match of 90 minutes. Package includes 1x USB Type C to C cable (charger not included).
175 GRAMS – Our disc meets the Professional Ultimate Frisbee standards for long, straight, precise flights and highly comfortable grip. It is great for freestyle tricks too!
UPGRADE YOUR GAME – Spice up your Christmas shopping list and favorite Frisbee bottle and tossing games (Beersbee, Polish Horseshoes or others) with our highly durable, waterproof and premium discs!

Read more

function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

function resetModalToInitialState(currentMonth, currentDate, currentYear) {
var enableOnlineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_onlineRadio’);
var enableOfflineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_offlineRadio’);
var onlineStoreInputForm = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_onlineInput’);
var offlineStoreInputForm = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_offlineInput’);
var onlineUrl = document.querySelector(‘#onlineUrl’);
var onlinePriceRaw = document.querySelector(‘#onlinePriceRaw’);
var onlineShippingRaw = document.querySelector(‘#onlineShippingRaw’);
var onlineDay = document.querySelector(‘#onlineDay’);
var onlineMonth = document.querySelector(‘#onlineMonth’);
var onlineYear = document.querySelector(‘#onlineYear’);
var onlineCalendar = document.querySelector(‘#onlineCalendar’);

var offlineStoreName = document.querySelector(‘#offlineStoreName’);
var offlineCity = document.querySelector(‘#offlineCity’);
var offlineState = document.querySelector(‘#offlineState’);
var offlinePriceRaw = document.querySelector(‘#offlinePriceRaw’);
var offlineDay = document.querySelector(‘#offlineDay’);
var offlineMonth = document.querySelector(‘#offlineMonth’);
var offlineYear = document.querySelector(‘#offlineYear’);
var offlineCalendar = document.querySelector(‘#offlineCalendar’);

var thankYouDiv = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_thank’);
var errorDiv = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_error’);
var submitButton = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_submit’);
var loadingGifDiv = document.querySelector(‘#loading’);

var stateDefaultOption = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultOption’);
var stateDefaultPrompt = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultPrompt’);

if (thankYouDiv) {
thankYouDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (errorDiv) {
errorDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (loadingGifDiv) {
loadingGifDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (submitButton) {
submitButton.style.display = ‘block’;
}
onlineUrl.value = ”;
onlinePriceRaw.value = ”;
onlineShippingRaw.value = ”;
offlineStoreName.value = ”;
offlineCity.value = ”;
offlineState.value = ”;
offlinePriceRaw.value = ”;

stateDefaultOption.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();
stateDefaultPrompt.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();

setInitialStates(
onlineMonth,
currentMonth,
offlineMonth,
onlineDay,
currentDate,
offlineDay,
onlineYear,
currentYear,
offlineYear,
onlineStoreInputForm,
offlineStoreInputForm,
enableOfflineStoreRadio,
enableOnlineStoreRadio,
onlineCalendar,
offlineCalendar
);
}

Price: $10.63
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:22:18 UTC – Details)


UNO is the classic family card game that’s easy to pick up and impossible to put down! Players take turns matching a card in their hand with the current card shown on top of the deck either by color or number. Special action cards, like Skips, Reverses, Draw Twos, color-changing Wild and Draw Four Wild cards, deliver game-changing moments as they each perform a function to help you defeat your opponents. If you can’t make a match, you must draw from the center pile. And when you’re down to one card, don’t forget to shout “UNO!” The first player to get rid of all the cards in their hand wins. Now card game-lovers can get UNO in a sturdy tin that’s great for travel and makes storage stress-free. Colors and decorations may vary.
UNO is the classic family card game that’s easy to learn and so much fun to play!
In a race to deplete your hand, match one of your cards with the current card shown on top of the deck by either color or number.
Strategize to defeat your competition with special action cards like Skips, Reverses, Draw Twos and color-changing Wild cards.
When you’re down to one card, don’t forget to shout “UNO!”
This fun family card game is perfect for adults, teens and kids 7 years old and up.


Classic UNO

UNO is the card game that’s easy to pick up and impossible to put down! All it takes to win is a little coordination between colors (red, green, blue, and yellow) and numbers. This fun family card game is takes only minutes to learn and is so much fun to play!

Read more


Make Your Match!

In this fun race to get rid of all your cards, players take turns matching one of their own cards with the card that appears face-up on the discard pile by either color or number. If you are unable to play a card from your own hand, you must retrieve a card from the draw pile.

Read more


Changing Moments

With 32 special action cards—Skips, Reverses, Draw Twos, Wild, and Draw Four Wild—the outcome of the game can shift at any moment! A color-changing Wild card can be played at any time to change the current suit color.

Read more


​Call it Out!

Don’t forget to yell ‘UNO’ when you have but one card remaining! The first player to get rid of all their cards wins the game. UNO Tin is travel-friendly and makes storage stress-free.

Read more

5
Price: $10.63
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:22:18 UTC – Details)

Product specification:
Material: high quality pp plastic
Size: 7×0.6×1.1 inch/18cm×1.6×2.8 cm
Color: black
Package includes:
36 x inflatable stakes
Notes:
Please allow slight difference on size due to manual measurement.
Please allow a slight color error due to different displays.
Package content: you will receive 36 pieces of black inflatable stakes, the sufficient quantity can well meet your needs and replacements at various occasions, providing convenience for your life
Universal size: the size of each plastic inflatable stake is about 7×0.6×1.1 inch/18cm×1.6×2.8 cm, proper in size, suitable for most tent, besides, they are lightweight and portable, easy to carry and store
Premium material: these inflatable stakes are made of high quality pp plastic, sturdy and durable, reliable and excellent, not easy to break and rust, can be used for a long time
Easy to use: it is easy for you to use the plastic inflatable stakes, firstly, you need to insert the stake into the ground at an angle, and then tie one end of the rope to the stake and fix the other end on the inflatable film, convenient and practical
Extensive uses: these inflatable stakes can be used for a variety of festivals, such as Holloween, Christmas and so on; in addition, they are ideal for inflatable toys, tents, etc., creating a wonderful scene for you

From the brand

Visit BIIB Store for More

[Perfect Gifts for Men] —Are you still hesitating about what gift to your dad/husband/boyfriend? If he likes camping, hiking, picnicking, fishing, climbing and other outdoorsy sports, the BIIB multitool hammer is a perfect gift idea. Whether Christmas, father’s day, birthday, anniversary or Valentine’s day gifts, this personalized gift will bring happiness to the person you give it!
[12-in-1 Multitool Hammer] —BIIB tool hammer with 12 functions, including a mini hammer, nail claw, pliers, regular pliers, pipe cutter, knife, saw, serrated knife, file, flathead screwdrivers, Phillips screwdrivers, bottle opener, this is a most useful tool in daily life. And this unique design hammer is a perfect choice of gifts for men who like camping, mountaineering, home renovation or DIY jobs.
[Practical & Cool Gadgets]—The best gift choice for handymen, hunters, fishermen, or DIY dads. This multitool hammer is a cool gadget for hands-on guys. Get one for your boyfriend, dad, grandpa, or husband as a unique gift. They will love it!
[Portable & Convenient]—The size of this hammer is only 13.5cm. Come with a portable and easy-to-carry nylon case. It can be kept in backpacks, insect-proof kits, cars, hiking, camping gear, or at home. You can use this hammer with multitool accessories almost anywhere!
[Quality Assurance ]—BIIB tool hammers are made of premium stainless steel that’s rust, corrosion-resistant, and tough enough to stand up to all your hands-on projects. A lightweight stainless steel multitool hammer can reduce the burden of going out or hiking. It is a must-have addition to anyone’s camping gear and equipment. If you have any questions about the product, please contact us, and we will solve them for you as soon as possible.


Are you looking for a unique gift for your husband or father? BIIB mini hammer multitool is your best choice!

BIIB 12 in 1 Multi-tools Including-- Mini hammer, nail claw, pliers, regular pliers, pipe cutter, knife, saw, serrated knife, file, flathead screwdrivers, phillips screwdrivers, bottle opener, good camping gear and equipment.

Easy to Carry-- Our mini hammer multitool is made of durable stainless steel; you can easily slip it inside your pocket. This camping gadget is also equipped with a black carrying case attached to the belt.

MULTIPLE FUNCTIONS APPLY TO VARIOUS SITUATIONS IN YOUR LIFE

Perfect Gifts for Men/Dad/Husband/Boyfriend/Him etc. Well-Build Multitool for Camping, Daily-Use, Hiking, Fishing, etc.

From the brand

The philosophy of PAROGO is “Impossible Made Possible”.

PARIGO is committed to designing practical and affordable multi tools for customers. Product quality has always been the top priority for a long time, so PARIGO enjoys a good reputation among customers and the industry.

PARIGO is always on the road of growth and innovation!

Visit PARIGO Store for More

Snowflake Multitool

Credit Card Tool

Cool Gifts for Men Women On Many Gift-giving Occasions – The LED flashlight gloves are great gadgets and tools that you never thought you needed, but can make your life easier because the LED gloves can illuminate the darkness like a handy flashlight and let you focus on the work. With a pretty gift package, the flashlight gloves are the perfect gift ideas for men, women, dad, husband, boyfriend as birthday gifts, Valentine’s Day Gifts, Father’s Day Gifts, Christmas gifts, Stocking Stuffers.
One Size Fits Most, Stretchy for Large Hands – The fingerless flashlight gloves are made of stretchy fabric, and with lengthened straps they can fit most adult men’s or women’s fingers and wrist. The cool flashlight gloves are useful gadgets for handyman, car lovers, electricians, engineers, mechanics, plumbers, truck drivers, delivery men when work at dark spaces. The lighted gloves are also helpful for fishing, outdoor running, camping, hiking, dog walking in the early morning or at dusk.
Gifts Under $20/30 for Men/Women Who Have Everything – With bright lights at your fingertips, it’s like having an assistant holding a LED flashlight for you. The LED light gloves will come in handy for seeing at night when grilling/ BBQ, dog walks, night snow shoveling, working on/ under vehicles, and endless possibilities. The cool gadgets plus personalized gifts are under 20 dollars but can beat much more expensive gifts. Ideal small gifts for men women who have everything and hard to buy.
Personality Gifts Wrap, Worry-free Service – If you’re looking for unique gear as stocking stuffers or birthday gifts for family or friends, the PARIGO LED flashlight gloves are the perfect gift ideas you need. All PARIGO products are backed by a hassle-free return policy. For any product issue, we offer 100% money-back and a 24-month worry-free after-sale service. Simply send us a request, we will assist you to solve any problem.

Read more

LED Flashlight Gloves Provide A Third Helping Hand. The Perfect Solution for Those Dark Moments

Sometimes you may be working on something that requires you to use both hands and it’s already dark where you can’t hold a flashlight and still work.

It may be riding your bike, doing some tasks in the garage, outdoors, or inside your house.

Well, there you should not worry anymore because you can use PARIGO LED flashlight gloves which you just put on your hands,

illuminate for you and work comfortably.

WHY PARIGO LED FLASHLIGHT GLOVES?

  • Keep your hands-free to focus on your work
  • The upgrade LED light is more directed adequate for your task
  • The batteries are replaceable that the LED fishing gloves can be reused for a long time
  • Stretchable finger-less gloves. One size fits most.
  • Cool gadget gifts ideas for men & women

HOLIDAY GIFTS GUIDE. PERSONALITY GIFTS WRAP.

PARIGO LED Flashlight Gloves Are Cool Gifts for Men/ Women On Many Gift-giving Occasions:

Birthday Gifts for men, Christmas Gifts for dad, Stocking Stuffers for brothers, Anniversary Gifts for husband wife or couples,

Thanksgiving Day Gifts for friends, Father’s Day gifts for dad, Mother’s Day gifts for mom, Valentine’s Day Gifts for him, and more.

Who Will Be Happy To Receive These Unique Gifts?

Marvel Gifts for Male/ female. Novelty Birthday Gifts for men Women. Unusual Birthday Gifts for Husband from wife.

Father’s Day Gifts for Dad from Daughter or Son. Cool Gifts for New Dad/ Step Dad/ Father in Law. Geek Gifts for Boyfriend or guys.

Gifts for Grandpa / elderly from grand child. Gag Gifts for Teen young brothers. White elephant gifts for adults or teenagers, niece or nephew. Housewarming gifts for friends or coworkers. Practical birthday gift ideas for dad who wants nothing and hard to buy. Xmas Santa presents for men. Valentines day gifts for him husband. Awesome Easter gifts for young tween. Fishing gifts for men unique gadget. Truck driver gifts for men.

Emergency flashlight for delivery men. Boating gifts for men dad. Useful lighting gadget for women who like knitting or DIY.

For Indoor Outdoor Use

The PARIGO lighted gloves are convenient and handy finger-less gloves with 2 LED lights built on index and thumb fingers.

It is multi-functional and can be used for many activities during the night, such as reading in the bed or working on a computer without turning on the lights and disturbing the roommate, repairing car jeep motorcycle in the garage, dog walking, patrol, fishing, hunting, riding and many more.

Thus the hand light gloves are also cool gifts for outdoorsman, camper, biker, hiker who love outdoor activities in the early morning or at dusk including running, hiking, camping, hunting, fishing, cycling, and more.

WHAT WILL LED FLASHLIGHT GLOVES BRING TO US?

  • Ample light for outdoor activities like fishing, cycling
  • The lights on fingertips can free the hands when working or repairing
  • Provide a good view while we’re running
  • Offer adequate lights for us to focus on things

Soft and Stretchy – One Size Fits Most

The PARIGO LED lighted gloves are made of premium spandex material which is lightweight, soft, and stretchable. So it can fit most adults or teens’ fingers.

The elastic fastening strap helps secure the LED gloves around the wrist.

Fingerless Gloves – Comfortable and Handy

The fingerless gloves will not hinder the movements of your fingers even when you are doing fine art & crafts, knitting, sewing or repairing. So it’s a cool gadget for men and women who often need extra lights when working with their hands.

What You Will Receive

1. one pair of flashlight gloves

2. with preinstalled cell batteries (common CR2016)

3. and 4 extra batteries (2 for each glove)

4. a storage pouch

5. user manual

6. beautiful gift box

HANDMADE PREMIUM MEXICAN BLANKET: Our serape and baja blankets are cozy, practical, and full of vibrant colors to add joy wherever you take them. Offered in pack of 1, each Aztec blanket is unique, woven by local artisans in Tlaxcala, Mexico on a traditional wooden loom.
THE PERFECT YOGA BLANKET: Take this high-quality Mexican blanket to your yoga practice. Super soft, breathable, and easy to carry – choose your colors and mix for your workouts!
VERSATILE & STYLISH: Perfect for every adventure, these Mexican blankets are your go-to blanket for yoga, picnics, long summer nights, or to cuddle in while relaxing at home!
SOFT & DURABLE: Twin bed size (45×70 inches), lightweight (3 pounds), and soft – these serape blankets are made to last! They get softer and more comfortable with every wash, while you enjoy their proven quality!
GIFTS THAT GIVE BACK: An original and authentic handmade artisan gift for every occasion! A gift that makes a difference. For each blanket you buy, we donate to our charity partner “Water mission”. Join us in the fight against poverty and for equal access to water!

item.title: SIMPLUT Toothpaste Tablet with Fluoride – Camping Travel Hiking Backpacking – Vegan Natural Ingredient – White Teeth, Fresh Breath (Peppermint) (60 Count (Pack of 1))
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) Product Description Freshen Your Breath Wherever You Go Bringing tubes of toothpaste when you travel can be a hassle. Needing to put them into clear zipper bags for airport security? Or how about those tubes being squished and exploding all over your luggage. Either way, a day spent being hassled ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $13.98
(as of Nov 29,2022 03:37:49 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Freshen Your Breath Wherever You Go

Bringing tubes of toothpaste when you travel can be a hassle. Needing to put them into clear zipper bags for airport security? Or how about those tubes being squished and exploding all over your luggage.

Either way, a day spent being hassled by screening officers or washing off exploded dried toothpaste from your clothes is surely not how you intend to travel. With SIMPLUT’s toothpaste tablets, you can travel freely and have fresh breath and clean teeth no matter where you are in the world.

Exceptional Dental Care Without Harsh Chemicals

We think of toothpaste as great for the teeth. And they are—aside from the many out there that contain chemicals harmful to our health and well-being in the long run.

Our toothpaste tablets taste good and are naturally flavored with Xylitol, sage, and green tea extracts. Paraben-free, these tabs also contain Vitamins B6, E, C, and fluoride for better dental health.

Sustainable Oral Care Solution

Making the switch to zero-waste living or just wanting to try out a product that’ll redefine the way you use toothpaste? 100% plastic-free, SIMPLUT Toothpaste Tablets come in a tin case that lets you get the most out of portable toothpaste. Take one tablet, chew, and brush. No more squeezing that last bit of toothpaste from a tube.

keep your teeth healthy With Chewable Toothpaste

Keep your teeth healthy and away from plaque and cavities while keeping your breath fresh. SIMPLUT Toothpaste Tablets contain fluoride to strengthen tooth enamel. Other toothpaste tablets don’t contain fluoride, which means that your teeth aren’t getting the protection they need to stay healthy.

Suitable for Vegans Too

SIMPLUT Toothpaste Tablets are made only with plant-based ingredients. These peppermint-flavored tablets do not contain any raw animal substances and are never tested on animals. Gluten-free, SIMPLUT toothpaste is also recognized by “Wasteless Design”, a certification given to products that reduce your carbon footprint through plastic-free packaging.

Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 2.95 x 2.87 x 1.18 inches; 2.4 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ sl001
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ May 6, 2019
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ SIMPLUT
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B07RLNKLP8

EASY TO USE: The mouthwash tablets are incredibly easy to use. Take a tablet or two, chew it a few times, and brush away! The micro particles will clean your teeth, and whiten your teeth.
MINIMAL CHEMICAL USE: Our flavored toothpaste tablets contain Vitamins B6, E, C, Xylitol, aloe extract and fluoride, without any parabens or sulphates. These tablets provide best possible dental care while using the least amount of chemicals possible.

Read more

Read more

(as of Nov 29,2022 01:24:54 UTC – Details)


LifeStraw Personal Water Filter for Hiking, Camping, Travel, and Emergency Preparedness
Removes bacteria & parasites: The microfiltration membrane removes 99.999999% of waterborne bacteria (including E. coli and salmonella), and 99.999% of waterborne parasites (including giardia and cryptosporidium)
Removes microplastics: Removes the smallest microplastics found in the environment (down to 1 micron), and reduces turbidity down to 0.2 microns
Rigorous Testing: All claims are verified with laboratories using standard testing protocols set by the US EPA, NSF, ASTM for water purifiers
Long Lifetime: The microbiological filter will provide 4,000 liters (1,000 gallons) of clean and safe drinking water with proper use and maintenance
Make an Impact: For every LifeStraw product purchased, a school child in need receives safe drinking water for an entire school year.BPA Free materials

Product Description

BUNDLE OF FEATURES: 19 inch flat screen TV has potential features for you to not settle for less. HDMI、VGA and USB inputs are connected with external audio and video playback. AV input is there to use with DVD players or Game Systems. Built in speaker for party while Headphone Jack is for private viewing.
ENDLESS CONNECTIVITY: Computer,DVR,Apple TV, Amazon Firestick, Roku, Slingbox, Chromecast, WIFI Box ,DVD players and of course gaming consoles. You can also connect your monitor to the computer host that will allow you to use your TV as a computer monitor.
SUITABLE FOR HOME & RV TV: Wall-mountable TV is designed specifically to make your small and compact area in the house quite useful. You can enjoy watching your favorite shows and a lot more without worrying of putting this under cabinet tv at a special dedicated place. This portable tv is enough to be a good companion of yours, while you’re on the go in a truck, on RV camping or even if you have a tight kitchen and bedroom space for your tv.
UNIQUE REMOTE CONTROL:Control your TV with one remote control with clear every button function, very easy to use.(Note: Because the remote control code is different，19‘’ Televison is not compatible with Xfinity/Direct tv/Comcast /Verizon remotes ,require user to use two remote controls to operate tv.)
